languages.text: {n}Лидер воинов-Эксплораторов всходит на мостик, и переборка трепещет под его стальной поступью. С вашей последней встречи он успел обзавестись новой грозной броней и более внушительными орудиями уничтожения, закрепленными на мехадендритах.{/n} "Единица Оптикон-22 начинает процедуру //авторизации//торжественного приветствия//. Опция обмена стратегическими данными разблокирована".

{n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."
languages.original_text: {n}Лидер воинов-Эксплораторов всходит на мостик, и переборка трепещет под его стальной поступью. С вашей последней встречи он успел обзавестись новой грозной броней и более внушительными орудиями уничтожения, закрепленными на мехадендритах.{/n} "Единица Оптикон-22 начинает процедуру //авторизации//торжественного приветствия//. Опция обмена стратегическими данными разблокирована".

traits.locale_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the bulkhead trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since last the two of you met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}开拓者战士的首领出现在了舰桥上，舱壁在他的金属步伐下颤抖。自从你们上次见面之后，他换上了一套强大的新盔甲，机械触须上也安装了更加强大的毁灭性武器。{/n}“奥普蒂孔22号启动//识别//正式问候//程序，正在解锁战略数据交换选项。”
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."

traits.locale_text: {n}开拓者战士的首领出现在了舰桥上，舱壁在他的金属步伐下颤抖。自从你们上次见面之后，他换上了一套强大的新盔甲，机械触须上也安装了更加强大的毁灭性武器。{/n}“奥普蒂孔22号启动//识别//正式问候//程序，正在解锁战略数据交换选项。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Le chef des guerriers explorators apparaît sur la passerelle, en faisant trembler la cloison à chacun de ses pas métalliques. Depuis votre dernière rencontre, il a opté pour une nouvelle armure impressionnante et ses mécadendrites sont équipées d'armes encore plus redoutables.{/n} « L'unité Opticon-22 lance la procédure //d'identification//de salut officiel//. Déblocage de l'option d'échange de données stratégiques. »
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le chef des guerriers explorators apparaît sur la passerelle, en faisant trembler la cloison à chacun de ses pas métalliques. Depuis votre dernière rencontre, il a opté pour une nouvelle armure impressionnante et ses mécadendrites sont équipées d'armes encore plus redoutables.{/n} « L'unité Opticon-22 lance la procédure //d'identification//de salut officiel//. Déblocage de l'option d'échange de données stratégiques. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}探索艦隊の戦士のリーダーがブリッジに現れ、デッキは彼の金属の足取りで振動している。前回ふたりが会って以来、彼は恐ろしい装甲を身につけ、機械触手にはより恐ろしい破壊兵器が装備されている。{/n}「ユニット・オプティコン-22が//身分特定//正式な挨拶//手順を実施中。戦略的データ交換という選択肢を解放します」
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."

traits.locale_text: {n}探索艦隊の戦士のリーダーがブリッジに現れ、デッキは彼の金属の足取りで振動している。前回ふたりが会って以来、彼は恐ろしい装甲を身につけ、機械触手にはより恐ろしい破壊兵器が装備されている。{/n}「ユニット・オプティコン-22が//身分特定//正式な挨拶//手順を実施中。戦略的データ交換という選択肢を解放します」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}El líder de los guerreros de los Exploradores aparece en el puente de mando. Su peso metálico provoca que tiemble el mamparo. Dispone de una armadura distinta a la de la última vez que os visteis y sus mecadendritas ahora vienen equipadas con armas destructoras más formidables.{/n} «Unidad Opticon-22 iniciando protocolo de //identificación//saludo oficial//. Desbloqueando opción de intercambio de datos estratégicos».
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."

traits.locale_text: {n}El líder de los guerreros de los Exploradores aparece en el puente de mando. Su peso metálico provoca que tiemble el mamparo. Dispone de una armadura distinta a la de la última vez que os visteis y sus mecadendritas ahora vienen equipadas con armas destructoras más formidables.{/n} «Unidad Opticon-22 iniciando protocolo de //identificación//saludo oficial//. Desbloqueando opción de intercambio de datos estratégicos».
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Der Anführer der Explorator-Krieger erscheint auf der Brücke, und das Schott erzittert unter seinen metallischen Schritten. Seit Eurer letzten Begegnung hat er offenbar eine neue furchterregende Rüstung angelegt, und seine Mechadendriten sind mit weiteren formidablen Vernichtungswaffen ausgerüstet.{/n} "Einheit Opticon-22 leitet Prozedur //Identifikation//offizielle Begrüßung// ein. Option des strategischen Datenaustauschs wird freigeschaltet."
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anführer der Explorator-Krieger erscheint auf der Brücke, und das Schott erzittert unter seinen metallischen Schritten. Seit Eurer letzten Begegnung hat er offenbar eine neue furchterregende Rüstung angelegt, und seine Mechadendriten sind mit weiteren formidablen Vernichtungswaffen ausgerüstet.{/n} "Einheit Opticon-22 leitet Prozedur //Identifikation//offizielle Begrüßung// ein. Option des strategischen Datenaustauschs wird freigeschaltet."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: {n}Keşiftör savaşçılarının lideri köprüde belirirken güverte, adamın metal adımları altında titriyor. Son karşılaşmanızdan bu yana dehşet saçan yeni bir zırh seti edinmiş, mekadentritleri ise haşmetli yıkım silahlarına dönüşmüş gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Opticon-22 birimi, //kimlik saptama//resmî selamlama// prosedürünü başlatıyor. Stratejik veri aktarımı seçeneğinin kilidi açılıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The leader of the Explorator warriors appears on the bridge, and the deck trembles beneath his metal gait. He has acquired a new set of fearsome armour since the two of you last met, and his mechadendrites are now fitted with more formidable weapons of destruction.{/n} "Unit Opticon-22 initiating //identification//official greeting// procedure. Unlocking the option of strategic data exchange."
